summary: Be able to Gift Teddy Bears to your adopted children in Hearthfires
descriptionHtml:
[color=White][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Giftable Teddies!
[color=White][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]V1
[color=White][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]11/03/12
[color=White][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Miscellaneous
[color=White][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]Forzane
[color=White]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=White]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
DLC: Hearthfires is required for this mod to work
[color=White]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=White]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=White][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-------------------------[/color]
Ever wanted to be able to gift something cute and Cuddley to your adopted children, well now you can with giftable Teddy Bears!

[color=White][size=4]Detail:[/size][/color]
[color=White]--------------------[/color]
The Bears are purchasable from your local Khajiit Caravan Vendors for one low price and a choice of 9 different styles of Teddies!

[color=White][size=4]Location:[/size][/color]
[color=White]----------------------[/color]
on Khajiit Caravan Vendors

[color=White][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=White]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=White][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------------------[/color]
-open zip 
-drop teddybeargift.esp and teddybeargift.bsa into Skyrim Data Directory
[color=White][size=3]N.M.M. Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-------------------------------[/color]
Download with Manager then activate in NMM


[color=White][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=White]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=White][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-----------------------------------[/color]
delete teddybeargift.esp and teddybeargift.bsa 
[color=White][size=3]N.M.M. Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------------------[/color]
uncheck esp

[color=White][size=4]Known issues and bugs:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-----------------------------------[/color]
NONE!!

[color=White][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=White]-------------------------------[/color]
None!!

[color=White][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------[/color]
Teddy Bear mesh and textures are brought to you by ..
Tamira and Arion (known on Skyrim Nexus as Ariont50) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16625

[color=White][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=White]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
[url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url]
[url=http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/]Photoshop[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=White][size=4]Mod Dependencies:[/size][/color]
[color=White]------------------------------[/color]
HearthFire


[color=White][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=White]---------------------------------[/color]
Modify, as long as you give Credit to the authors including the creator of the original model and let me know.
author: Forzane
